participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, loves to share experiences.
participant_1.background: I have two pet dogs. I hope to travel the world one day. My favorite music genre is rock. I am a farmer.

participant_2.name: Claire
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, enjoys making new friends.
participant_2.background: I am a French girl, but I moved to the US last year. I donâ€™t have too many friends in the US yet, but I am going to summer camp and I hope to make friends then! I also think that I may make friends as soccer in the fall. I live with my parents and my little brother. I am in 3rd grade. I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix.

content.text: Hi there! My name is participant_1.
Hi participant_2, my name is participant_2.
It's nice to meet you! Where are you from?
I'm from France, but I moved to the US last year.
Oh, that's cool! How do you like it here?
It's a lot different than France, but I'm starting to get used to it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer, draw, and read Asterix comics.
Oh, I love soccer too! I used to play on my high school team.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at it, but I have fun.
It's still a lot of fun even if you're not very good at it.
I know, right? I just like to run around and kick the ball.
Me too! It's a great way to get exercise.
Yeah, it is. I also like to draw. I'm not very good at it, but I like to do it.
That's great! I'm not very good at drawing either, but I still like to do it.
I know, right? It's a fun way to express yourself.
Yeah, it is. I like to draw pictures of my friends and family.
That's nice! I like to draw pictures of my favorite characters from books and movies.
That's cool! I like to read Asterix comics.
Oh, I love Asterix comics! They're so funny.
Yeah, they are. I love the way they make fun of the Romans.
Me too! I also love the way they depict ancient Gaul.
Yeah, it's so different from what we think of as ancient Rome.
I know, right? It's really cool.
I'm glad we're both Asterix fans.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
